Plot: A teenager faces an uphill battle when she fights to give women the opportunity to play competitive soccer.
Title: Gracie
Writer: Lisa Marie Petersen (screenplay), Karen Janszen (screenplay), Andrew Shue (story), Ken Himmelman (story), Davis Guggenheim (story)
Actors: Jesse Lee Soffer, Christopher Shand, Carly Schroeder, Karl Girolamo
tomatoConsensus: Gracie can be rousing and touching in spots, but is ultimately undone by its predictable story arc and a lack of nuance.
